title: Maureen Dowd: The Importance of Bumfuzzle
description: In the first episode of 1947: The Meet the Press Podcast, Chuck Todd sits down with Maureen Dowd, New York Times columnist and author of the new book, The Year of Voting Dangerously.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
